column4:
['Ham matavale naujavan, manzilo ke ujale', '
Log kare badanami, kaise ye duniya vale', '
Kare bhalai ham, bure bane har dam', '
Is jahan ki, rit nirali', '
Pyar ko samjhe, hay re hay sitam', '
Ham matavale naujavan', 'Ham dhul me lipte sitare,', '
Ham zarre nahi hai agare', '
Nadan hai jaha, samajhega kahan', '
Ham naujavan ke ishare', '
Jab jab jhum ke nikale ham', '
Jaan ke pad jaye lale', '
Log kare badanami, kaise ye duniya vale', '
Ham matavale naujavan', 'Ham rote dilo ko hasa de', '
Dukh dadr ki aag bujhaa de', '
Bechain nazar, betaab jigar', '
Ham sabako ko gale se laga le', '
Ham man mauzi sahazade', '
Dukhiyo ke rakhavale', '
Log kare badanami', '
Kaise ye duniya vaale', '
Kare bhalai ham, bure bane har dam', '
Is jaha ki, rit nirali', '
Pyar ko samjhe, hay re hay sitam', 'Ham matavale naujavan, mazilo ke ujale', '
Log kare badanami, kaise ye duniya vale.']
